sql-script.name: contacts
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_contacts ( id char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar (32) not null, sex varchar (2) not null, birthday date, dept varchar (64), job varchar (64), email varchar (32), mobile varchar (16), workphone varchar (16), workphone2 varchar (16), fax varchar (16), homephone varchar (16), workaddress varchar (256), homeaddress varchar (256), postcode varchar (8), qq varchar (16), weixin varchar (16), description varchar (256), userid char (32), deptid char (32), primary key (id) );

create table sf_contacts_tag ( id char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar (32) not null, description varchar (256), oorder int4 not null, contacts int4 not null, primary key (id), unique (orgid, text), unique (oorder) );
create table sf_contacts_tagr ( id char(32) not null, tagid char(32) not null, contactsid char(32) not null, primary key(id), unique(tagid, contactsid) );

create table sf_mycontacts ( id char (32) not null, ownerid char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar (32) not null, sex varchar (2) not null, birthday date, dept varchar (64), job varchar (64), email varchar (32), mobile varchar (16), workphone varchar (16), workphone2 varchar (16), fax varchar (16), homephone varchar (16), workaddress varchar (256), homeaddress varchar (256), postcode varchar (8), qq varchar (16), weixin varchar (16), description varchar (256), userid char (32), deptid char (32), primary key (id), unique (ownerid, text) );

create table sf_mycontacts_tag ( id char (32) not null, ownerid char (32) not null, orgid char (32), text varchar (32) not null, description varchar (256), oorder int4 not null, contacts int4 not null, primary key (id), unique (ownerid, text), unique (oorder) );
